00019 // apparently this is a nice, fast rng. From http://groups.google.com/group/comp.lang.c/browse_thread/thread/a9915080a4424068/
00020 // not sure if credit needed. Called 'xorshift'. 
00021 
00022 unsigned long _rand(void) {
00023         static unsigned long x=123456789,
00024                              y=362436069,
00025                              z=521288629,
00026                              w=886375123,
00027                              v=886756453;
00028         
00029         unsigned long t;
00030         t=(x^(x>>7)); 
00031         x=y; y=z; z=w; w=v;
00032         v=(v^(v<<6))^(t^(t<<13)); 
00033         return (y+y+1)*v+rand()%2; // +rand%2 since _rand seems to give non-random numbers mod2.
00034  } 
00035  
00036 unsigned GenerateRandomNumber( unsigned low, unsigned high) { 
00037         
00038         return ((_rand()%(high-low+1))+low);
00039 
00040 }
00041 
00047 bool InitMode(long long mode) {
00048          if (mode & RESET_MODE) {
00049             glClearColor( 0, 0, 0, 1 );
00050                 glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00051                 glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00052                 glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00053                 glDisable(GL_NORMALIZE); 
00054                 glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00055                 glDisable(GL_LIGHT0); glDisable(GL_LIGHT1); glDisable(GL_LIGHT2); glDisable(GL_LIGHT3);
00056                 glDisable(GL_LIGHT4); glDisable(GL_LIGHT5); glDisable(GL_LIGHT6); glDisable(GL_LIGHT7);
00057                 glDisable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00058                 glTexEnvi(GL_TEXTURE_ENV, GL_TEXTURE_ENV_MODE, GL_MODULATE);
00059          }
00060          if (mode & NORMAL_PROJECTION) {
00061             glMatrixMode( GL_PROJECTION );
00062             glLoadIdentity();
00063             gluPerspective(40, (float)SCREEN_WIDTH / (float)SCREEN_HEIGHT, 1.0, 1000.0);
00064            
00065             glMatrixMode( GL_MODELVIEW );
00066             glLoadIdentity();   
00067                 
00068         }
00069         if (mode & MENU_MODE) {
00070                 InitMode(NORMAL_PROJECTION);
00071                 glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00072                 glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_COLOR, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00073         }
00074         if (mode & GAME_MODE) {
00075                 InitMode(NORMAL_PROJECTION);
00076                 glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00077                 glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00078                 glEnable(GL_NORMALIZE); 
00079                 
00080                 glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_COLOR, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00081 
00082                 glEnable(GL_LIGHT0);
00083                 glEnable(GL_LIGHTING);
00084             glEnable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00085                 glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00086                 //glTexEnvi(GL_TEXTURE_ENV, GL_TEXTURE_ENV_MODE, GL_REPLACE);
00087                 glHint(GL_PERSPECTIVE_CORRECTION_HINT, GL_NICEST);
00088                 
00089                 glColorMaterial(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_AMBIENT_AND_DIFFUSE);
00090             GLfloat ambientColor[] = {0.4f, 0.4f, 0.4f, 1.0f}; 
00091             glLightModelfv(GL_LIGHT_MODEL_AMBIENT, ambientColor);
00092                 GLfloat lightColor0[] = {0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, 1.0f}; 
00093             glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_DIFFUSE, lightColor0);
00094                 GLfloat pos[] = { 0.0, 4.0, -7 };
00095                 glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_POSITION, pos); 
00096         }
00097         CheckErrors();
00098         return true;
00099 }
00100 
00101 bool CheckErrors() {
00102 
00103         GLenum errCode;
00104         
00105         if ((errCode = glGetError()) != GL_NO_ERROR) {
00106            printf ("Throwing OpenGL Error: %s\n", gluErrorString(errCode));
00107            throw gluErrorString(errCode);
00108         }
00109         
00110         return true;
00111 }
